author: iSazonov
body:
## PR Summary

Close #7967 .

Allow creation of symbolic links when the process is not elevated. Developer Mode on Windows 10 (build >= 14972) must first be enabled.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/desktop/api/winbase/nf-winbase-createsymboliclinka

Seems we can not add tests because we can not enable/disable Developer Mode in runtime.
